snippet: Mr. Turner, who was honored on Tuesday morning by the Digital Place-Based Advertising Association, was given the first award presented by the group to someone its members deem an industry visionary.
abstract: Mr. Turner, who was honored on Tuesday morning by the Digital Place-Based Advertising Association, was given the first award presented by the group to someone its members deem an industry visionary.

headline.main: Ted Turner Cited for 'Place-Based' Media Efforts
